definition: the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)

sentences.english: During the Song Dynasty, reforming became the main current in the intellectual and political circle.
sentences.chinese: 两宋时期，求变思潮成为思想界与政治界的主流。

sentences.english: The men of letters exiled into Hainan Island during the Song Dynasty were mostly failures at factionalism .
sentences.chinese: 两宋被贬海南的文人多为党争失败者。

sentences.english: The Lu family was the most remarkable clan during the two Song dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 吕氏家族是两宋时期最引人注目的一个家族群体。

sentences.english: The first part introduces the phenomenon of women's remarriage in Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分介绍了两宋妇女再嫁的现象。

sentences.english: Song Dynasty was the refinement stage in the appreciation of the nature in China.
sentences.chinese: 两宋是中华自然审美的精致化阶段。

sentences.english: Engraving printing is in vogue for a time from its being invented to the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 雕版印刷发明后至两宋而盛极一时。

sentences.english: He was the first person who advocated Tu Fu in Song dynasty.
sentences.chinese: “两宋尊杜第一人”，王禹是当之无愧的。

sentences.english: The second part discusses the process of the Lou lineage's rise and development during the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第二节探究楼氏家族在两宋时期的兴衰过程。

sentences.english: The article is about the change of the relation between population and farmland in Sunan region in Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 文章对两宋时期苏南人地关系演变情况进行了探究。

definition: Song Dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
Five Dynasties (907-960) and Ten Kingdoms (902-979), period of political turmoil in ancient China
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
Song dynasty (960-1279)/used to distinguish it from 劉宋|刘宋 Song of Southern dynasties (420-479)
Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
Tang of the Five Southern Dynasties 937-975
